stablecoin.name: Stablecoin
stablecoin.description: Tokens that are fixed to an external asset, e.g. the US dollar

yield-farming.name: Yield Farming
yield-farming.description: Tokens that are doled out as rewards for providing liquidity to protocols

yfi-inspired.name: YFI Inspired
yfi-inspired.description: Tokens either associated with or inspired by the yEarn ecosystem

amm.name: Automated Market Maker
amm.descriptions: Tokens that govern on-chain automated market makers

synthetics.name: Synthetics
synthetics.description: Synthetic assets created to track the value of another asset

token-sets.name: TokenSets
token-sets.description: Token indices composed within Set Protocol

options.name: Options
options.description: Tokens that trustlessly recreate decentralized options contracts on other assets

nft.name: NFT
nft.description: Non-fungible tokens or tokens associated with the NFT ecosystem.

scaling.name: Scaling
scaling.description: Tokens associated with systems for scaling the Ethereum blockchain

daos.name: DAOs
daos.description: Tokens that govern decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs)

yield-bearing.name: Yield-Bearing
yield-bearing.description: Assets that are wrappers around other tokens earning yield in a DeFi system

payments.name: Payments
payments.description: Tokens that enable real-world payments for digital assets

zora.name: Zora
zora.description: Tokens created on the Zora platform
